availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Lewis Dorsheimer (St. Louis County, Missouri, saddler. )

body.p: St. Louis, St. Louis County, Missouri, saddler. Pennsylvania native. Married to Eugenia Close Dorsheimer in St. Louis County, Missouri, on January 30, 1851. Father of Ella Morris Dorsheimer and Lulu Dorsheimer. Saddler in St. Louis, St. Louis County, Missouri, in 1850. Saddler in St. Louis in 1860. Employed Brigette Witte and Delia Haven as servants in St. Louis in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Missouri, St. Louis County, St. Louis/Ward 3, p. 10.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Missouri, St. Louis County, St. Louis/Ward 4, p. 146.
Missouri, County Marriages, Naturalization, and Court Records (1800-1991), Missouri State Archives, Jefferson City, MO, St. Louis County Marriages, p. 89.
"Died," St. Louis Globe-Democrat (St. Louis, MO), November 17, 1892, p. 7.
